title: New game mode
body:
I recently thought of a game mode and i emailed a riot employee 
its basically 3 teams on the Crystal Scar and a champion can only be used once a game even if its death is from another team
if someone dies the have to pick a new champion and are able to go back into battle
whoever has most kills by the time a player cannot pick a champion due to too many deaths the game will end the team that has most kills will win and you can go back to play another.

Please tell me what you think in the comment section and vote for yes, no or yes but on another map/set-up 
 thank you!

replies.body: you would need to have your items refunded when you die but this would be awesome!

There have been an incredible number of variations of this, most have taken off faster then your gamemode (don't get me wrong, I completely get you were trying to be original on this) however most have been upvoted and comment spammed but I don't think from a logistical (and technical) point of view riot is willing to take the risk. If they screw it their entire source of funding goes down the toilet.
